content: The first revolt is against the supreme tyranny of theology, of the phantom of God. As long as we have a master in heaven, we will be slaves on earth.
translations: ita:La prima rivolta è contro la tirannia suprema della teologia, del fantasma di Dio. Finché abbiamo un padrone in cielo, s
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
